Make a "peace sign" with the right hand, but extend the ring finger as well.
Make a fist with the right hand and extend the index finger pointing out then trace a "V" in the air making the first stroke shorter then the second.
With the blade edge of the right hand facing away, touch tips of finger to the tip of the thumb and move the hand back toward the chest.
